title: Shadow Beauty
overview: Because of her looks, Goo Ae Jin is bullied at school and even insulted by strangers. But after school, she leads a secret life: with heavy makeup and hours of photo editing, she lives as Genie, a social media star with 770K followers. While Goo Ae Jin is toeing the line between her true self and Genie, what will happen when a boy from school discovers her secret?
